name: Testbox
description: A place to send your non-production emails

HOST_NAME.description: The host name of your app

RAILS_INBOUND_EMAIL_PASSWORD.description: The password to be used by your email provider to access the app's inbound webhook (https://guides.rubyonrails.org/action_mailbox_basics.html#sendgrid)

INBOUND_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Used only to display the email in the InboundEmails index page. The email address specified by your email provider where to send your emails.

USER_PASSWORD.description: Password used to log in Testbox app
